group_1.textRight: All I could do was infer what I could to fill in the@missing pieces, come up with a hypothesis...
And then seek confirmation.
By doing that, I deduced...
That all of this would establish that the young@girl the elder spoke to was a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: It would...?

group_1.textRight: Next, I added in the elements from my@interview with the old woman...
According to her, the blue flame is a lucky@omen of the Fire Festival.
It's unearthly invitation to the other side...@And also where Aobino gets its name from.

group_1.textLeft: So the Fire Festival and the blue flame were@connected after all, then...

group_1.textRight: Between the way the young girl had been@studying the Fire Festival,
and the sightings of blue flames in the ghost@story debacle...
This is just a theory on my end, but if these@had something to do with Magical Girls...
...It's possible this girl who was enthralled by the@occult...became a Witch and created a Labyrinth.
The ghost story debacle that may have spawned@from local supernatural folktales...
The forest where you sensed magic and@disappeared...
These are the remains of a young girl who@desired the otherworldly: a Witch's Labyrinth.
...Now, we'd made it this far, but our work@wasn't finished yet.
We still had to figure out how to find you...
...And that's when San came up with an idea.
Yes... I thought we should hold a Fire Festival@ceremony in the forest.

group_1.textLeft: A ceremony...? What kind?

group_1.textRight: I finished preparing for the bonfire!
I'm all set as well!
As am I.

group_1.textLeft: Alright...
Then let's get started...!
Whilst the blue flame is a marker that leads@to the realm of the supernatural...
The red flames of the Fire Festival act as a@beacon from their world to ours.
It would appear that was the original purpose@of the Fire Festival.
So we could communicate with the unearthly@in this way.

group_1.textRight: Kagura got the idea after the elder told@her about it.

group_1.textLeft: It may have been a pointless endeavor...
But there was a chance that something could@happen.
I thought...maybe it could make a difference.

group_1.textRight: And lo and behold, there you were, lying@on the ground.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, seriously?!@So you used the ritual to bring me back...

group_1.textRight: Well, it's not as though we found the Labyrinth@through the ritual or anything.
It was more like you got spat out of the@Labyrinth and collapsed.

group_1.textLeft: I definitely remember seeing a shining light@while I was running away...!

group_1.textRight: The Witch may have reacted to the fire, given@the way she's emulating ghost stories.

group_1.textLeft: And then it showed me the way out...@Or something like that...

group_1.textRight: In any case!
You'd been missing for two days, so we were@all quite worried!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! I was gone for that long?!

group_1.textRight: Yes, you were.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see...
I don't even know how I can begin@to thank you...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it.@We're the ones who should be thanking you.
You brought back some very valuable@information.

group_1.textLeft: ...You mean...

group_1.textRight: About "a girl" and those "Aru-chans."

group_1.textLeft: ...What?

group_1.narration: That girl you said you met...@Aru-chan taking the form of Aobino's youkai...
I can't be positive...but both of these fit@with the information we've been gathering.
From this, we can assume that the girl was@originally a Magical Girl, who eventually@became a Witch and then constructed her@Labyrinth deep in the woods.
That would make sense.@There are still a lot of unknowns, however.
Was the scenery you saw in what@seems to have been the Labyrinth real,@or an illusion created by the Witch...?
Plus your current appearance: Is that also@a result of the girl you met in the Labyrinth,@or is it caused by another factor...?

group_1.textRight: Those remain mysteries...

group_1.textLeft: But what we must do next is simple, is it not?

group_1.textRight: As Magical Girls, it's our destiny to defeat@Witches...

group_1.textLeft: It might be the culprit behind the ghost story@debacle, so we can't leave it be...!
...In other words...

group_1.textRight: Yes...
It is time...to bring an end to this.
